title: ArtyTorrent Pack 51-Hip Hop+Breaks Drum Loops 110-119 bpm-WAV
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 51-Hip Hop+Breaks Drum Loops 110-119 bpm-WAV
-------------------------------------------------------------

A selection of hip hop drums and funky breakbeats. Booming kick drums and crusty snares. Laidback loops and busy beats ranging from 110-119 bpm.

Torrent contains 7 RAR files with 136 loops
-------------------------------------------
Chicago Fire Breaks 110-119 (17 loops)
Machine Language Strange 110-119 (11 loops)
Misc Breakz 110-119 (48 loops)
Punked Up 115 (12 loops)
Twisted Breaks 110-118 (9 loops)
Zero-G Hip Hop 110 (27 loops)
Zero-G Hip Hop 115 (12 loops)


All samples have been normalized and acidized and are 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filenames.

The samples are from a variety of sources including CDs produced by East-West, Future Music Magazine, Sonic Foundry/Sony, and Zero-G.

This torrent is dedicated to breakbeat fans in Denmark who have managed to bypass the anti-piracy measures forced upon them by the record industry and continue to use TPB. Keep fighting the good fight!

--
Arty - "These are the breaks"
12th February 2008.
